scripts.build-raiden-pisa-daemon: cd build/raiden_demo/raiden-pisa-daemon && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-autominer: cd build/raiden_demo/autominer && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start-evm: ganache-cli -d -l 15000000 --allowUnlimitedContractSize --defaultBalanceEther 1000000 --mnemonic 'myth like bonus scare over problem client lizard pioneer submit female collect'
scripts.submodule: git submodule init && git submodule update
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test && npm run build && mocha build/test/src --exit && npm run test-mocked
scripts.test-coverage: npm run build && nyc mocha build/test/src --exit
scripts.test-integration: npm run build && npm run build-raiden-pisa-daemon && npm run build-autominer && mocha build/test/integration --exit
scripts.test-ts: mocha -r ts-node/register test/src && npm run test-raiden
